mapper.select: SELECT t.task_no taskNo , t.project_member_no projectMemberNo , w.work_member_name workMemberName FROM task_member t INNER JOIN project_member p ON t.project_member_no = p.project_member_no INNER JOIN workspace_member w ON p.work_member_no = w.work_member_no WHERE p.project_no = #{projectNo} AND p.active = 'Y'
